title: Restart Your Router
content:
Restarting your router can often resolve connectivity issues by resetting its internal systems.

### Steps to Restart Your Router

1. **Unplug the power cable** from your router.
2. **Wait for 10 seconds** to allow the router to fully power down.
3. Plug the power cable back in and wait a few moments for the router to start up completely.

Once the router is fully powered on, check if your device can connect to the internet.
